alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:18AM CST until January 12 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN LONOKE...EAST CENTRAL SALINE AND SOUTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1218 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Bryant, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Keo... Otter Creek... Ironton... Estes... Toltec Mounds State Park... Protho Junction... Sweet Home... Lakewood... Geyer Springs... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
